title: Gifting Chromas
body: I already saw the post about it saying that it was currently disabled, but, the comments were about 3 months old, I was wondering if they planned on adding it in or not. was planning on getting my friend a gnar chroma :(

replies.body:
At the moment Chromas still can't be sent as gifts. The main issue comes from this: if you were gifted a chroma and then refunded the skin which the chroma used, you'd be left with an unusable chroma =\ . 

We're still working on figuring out ways to re-enable chroma gifting, but in the meantime, you could send an RP gift to the person and let them know you'd like them to use it on a chroma ^_^!

Yeah, instead of birthday presents, here is $243 in cash and a shopping list of things I want you to get yourself. Oh sweety, I didn't forget Valentine's day, here is $22.50 for you to pick up some chocolates on the way home. That's totally how gifts work. This whole "still trying to figure it out" means that someone pitched the idea of the refunded skin in a stand-up meeting and no one has bothered to think about it since; nor will they cause haha whatever chromas.
